content: बर्हिस् {%<ab>m.</ab>%} {%<ab>n.</ab>%} [बर्ह् कर्मणि इसि] {@--1@} Kuśa grass; <ls>Ku. 1. 60.</ls> {@--2@} A bed or layer of Kuśa grass. {@--3@} A sacrifice, oblation. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} Fire. {@--2@} Light, splendour. {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} {@--1@} Water. {@--2@} Sacrifice. {@--3@} Ether.
